mapper.select: SELECT cpm.POST_NO, cpm.PLAN_NO, cpm.POST_TP_CD, cpm.POST_CONTS, cpm.POST_TITLE, cpm.SPOT_ADDR, cpm.INFO_URL, cpm.REMARK, cpm.MAIN_MENU, cpm.BIZ_HOURS, cpm.AMT, cpm.MPPG_YN, cpm.REG_DTIME, count(*) AS COMMENT_CNT FROM CT_POST_MGMT cpm, CT_COMMENT cc WHERE PLAN_NO = #{planNo:VARCHAR} AND cpm.POST_NO = cc.POST_NO;

SELECT POST_NO AS postNo, PLAN_NO AS planNo, POST_TP_CD AS postTypeCode, POST_CONTS AS postContents, POST_TITLE AS postTitle, SPOT_ADDR AS spotAddress, INFO_URL AS informationUrl, REMARK AS remark, MAIN_MENU AS mainMenu, BIZ_HOURS AS businessHours, AMT AS amount, MPPG_YN AS mappingYn, REG_DTIME AS registrationDateTime, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CT_COMMENT comm WHERE comm.POST_NO = POST_NO) AS commentCnt FROM CT_POST_MGMT WHERE POST_NO = #{postNo:VARCHAR};

SELECT cc.CMNT_NO, cc.POST_NO, cc.CMNT_GRP_NO, cc.CMNT_GRP_NO2, cc.CMNT_DEPTH, cc.CMNT_TXT, (SELECT NICK_NM FROM MB_MBR_MGMT WHERE MBR_NO = cc.REG_NO) AS NICK_NM, cc.REG_NO, cc.REG_DTIME, cc.USE_YN FROM CT_COMMENT cc WHERE POST_NO = #{postNo:VARCHAR} ORDER BY cc.CMNT_GRP_NO, cc.CMNT_GRP_NO2, cc.REG_DTIME;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CT_PLAN_MATE mate WHERE mate.PLAN_NO = (SELECT PLAN_NO FROM CT_POST_MGMT cpm WHERE cpm.POST_NO = #{postNo:VARCHAR}) AND mate.MBR_NO = #{commenterNo:VARCHAR};
mapper.update: UPDATE CT_COMMENT SET USE_YN = 'N', UPT_DTIME = now() WHERE CMNT_NO = #{commentNo:VARCHAR};
